desc: Rejuvenates, Soothes Fine Lines, Firms Delicate Eye Areas , Increases Collagen Production. Anti-aging eye cream duo features a fast-acting blend of Bakuchiol (Natural Retinol Alternative) and Hyaluronic Acid. Diminishes Dark Circles, Deeply Hydrates, Gently Exfoliates, Reduces Crows Feet

layout.text:
A Naturally Potent Combination of AHAs, Bakuchiol, and Hyaluronic Acid.
No Fillers or Water.
